hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Green Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Heart Container# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Milk Bottle#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #the Lens of Truth#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Left Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #Saria's Song#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Milk Bottle#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.
